snippet.title: HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
HITMAN 3 VR: Reloaded arrives exclusively on Meta Quest 3 this summer for $29.99 / £24.99 / €27.99.

Reloaded includes dual-wielding, a cel-shaded art-style, enhanced interactivity, overhauled UI, new movement options and more.

Pre-order now to save 10%: http://bit.ly/hitman-3-vr-meta-horizon-store
